biography: Paulus Gerardus Josephus Maria Polman, is a Dutch businessman and author. He was the chief executive officer (CEO) of the British/Dutch consumer goods company Unilever. Polman is also the co-author of Net Positive: How Courageous Companies Thrive by Giving More Than They Take.
